languages.text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

languages.text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}耗尽时，装备者对周围所有敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}，等同于装备者的{uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}耗尽时，装备者对周围所有敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}，等同于装备者的<u>最大{g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}移动点数{/g}</u>。
当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}耗尽时，装备者对周围所有敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}，等同于装备者的{uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78}。

languages.text: Когда у персонажа остается 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, он наносит {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}ударного урона{/g} всем противникам на соседних клетках.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: Когда у персонажа остается 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, он наносит <u>максимальное число ОП</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}ударного урона{/g} всем противникам на соседних клетках.
Когда у персонажа остается 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, он наносит <u>максимальное число ОП</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}ударного урона{/g} всем противникам на соседних клетках.

Когда у персонажа остается 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, он наносит {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}ударного урона{/g} всем противникам на соседних клетках.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が0になると、使用者は隣接するすべての敵に{uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78}の{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が0になると、使用者は隣接するすべての敵に<u>最大{g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}MP{/g}</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}を与える。
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が0になると、使用者は隣接するすべての敵に{uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78}の{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: Cada vez que los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del portador llegan a 0, el portador inflige {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}daño de impacto{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del portador llegan a 0, el portador inflige {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}daño de impacto{/g} a todos los enemigos adyacentes.
Cada vez que los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del portador llegan a 0, inflige {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} a todos los enemigos adyacentes.

languages.text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Trägers auf 0 fallen, verursacht der Träger {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Schlagschaden{/g} bei allen angrenzenden Feinden.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Trägers auf 0 fallen, verursacht der Träger <u>maximale {g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}BP{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Schlagschaden{/g} bei allen angrenzenden Feinden.

Immer wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Trägers auf 0 fallen, verursacht der Träger {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Schlagschaden{/g} bei allen angrenzenden Feinden.

languages.text: Lorsque les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de l'utilisateur arrivent à 0, il inflige {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} points de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}dégâts d'impact{/g} à tous les ennemis adjacents.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de l'utilisateur atteignent 0, il inflige <u>{g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}PD{/g} maximum</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}dégâts par impact{/g} à tous les ennemis adjacents.

Lorsque les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de l'utilisateur atteignent 0, il inflige <u>{g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}PD{/g} maximum</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}dégâts par impact{/g} à tous les ennemis adjacents.

Lorsque les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de l'utilisateur atteignent 0, il inflige {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} points de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}dégâts par impact{/g} à tous les ennemis adjacents.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'si 0'a indiğinde bitişiğindeki tüm düşmanlara {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}darbe hasarı{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
